alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Grant; Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:44PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cleveland, southeastern Grant and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 344 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamont, or 11 miles southwest of Pine Bluff, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Rison... Lamont... Kedron... Sulphur Springs... Watson Chapel... Mt Zion... Pinebergen... Faith... Randall... This includes Interstate 530 between mile markers 41 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and southeastern Arkansas.
